entry.title: Chrome running slower in macOS than in emulated windows 10 under macOS
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Run https://turbowarp.org/964537765?fps=250&hqpen in macOS Sonoma. Click greenflag to start animation 2. see that the animation lags a lot 3. Run https://turbowarp.org/964537765?fps=250&hqpen in emulated Parallels Windows 10 in macOS Sonoma. Click greenflag to start animation 4. compare the smoothness of the animation in emulated Windows 10 vs same animation in macOS Sonoma
# Problem Description When I run https://turbowarp.org/964537765?fps=250&hqpen in macOS Sonoma (click greenflag to start animation) the animation lags a lot. Instead, if I run the same animation in emulated Windows 10 (Parallels emulator) on the same macOS computer, the animation is perfectly smooth.
# Additional Comments In other browsers (e.g. Firefox) the animation is slow both in macOS and emulated Windows 10. But I don't understand way it shouldn't work fine in the emulated Windows 10 in the same computer where I run Chrome in macOS
# Summary Chrome running slower in macOS than in emulated windows 10 under macOS
# Custom Questions #### Example URL: https://turbowarp.org/964537765?fps=250&hqpen
#### Does the problem occur on multiple sites? Not sure - I don't know
#### Is it a problem with a plugin? No - It's the browser itself
#### Does this work in other browsers? Not sure - I don't know
# Additional Data Category: Content \ Chrome Channel: Not sure \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: Network list goes under status bar
entry.content:
Chrome Version : 121.0.6167.185 OS : WIN 11
What steps will reproduce the problem? Go to any website. open dev tools, open network tab. with websites with more than screen height rows, the last row goes under the status bar and cant reveal it.
What is the expected result? last row should be on before the status bar
What happens instead? goes under status bar

entry.title: Width attribute of ::-webkit-scrollbar is ignored if scrollbar-color is specified on * element.
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Define global CSS command: ::-webkit-scrollbar{ background-color: transparent; height: 8px; width: 8px; } 2. Define: * { scrollbar-color: #bdc1c6 transparent; }
# Problem Description Scrollbar width is set to default instead of 8px.
# Summary Width attribute of ::-webkit-scrollbar is ignored if scrollbar-color is specified on * element.
# Custom Questions #### Which component does this fall under? Blink>Scroll
#### Does this work in other browsers? Yes - This is just a Chrome problem
# Additional Data Category: API \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: Yes

entry.title: Side panel not showing bookmarks in custom order (please make side panel have the option to show bookmarks in the custom order they were saved under the bookmarks bar)
entry.content:
Bookmarks can only be listed in some specific ways. Either oldest to newest, visa versa, last opened, or alphabetically, which is completely useless for somebody with hundreds and thousands of bookmarks organized in folders and subfolders...
I want my side panel to be exactly like my top bookmarks bar. And to show the bookmarks in that exact order.
The side panel could be a nice feature if it would work correctly in this case. Also, the changes should show up visa versa, meaning if I put some bookmarks in another order, create a folder, or move them in the side panel, the changes should also show up in the top bookmarks bar.
This makes the bookmarks system harder to navigate because any muscle memory or logical grouping/ordering is not usable in the bookmarks sidebar.
Please fix this important issue and make sure both the bookmarks bar and side panel show them in the same order they were organized including folders and subfolders.

entry.content: Feature: SyncShowIdentityErrorsForSignedInUsers Launch bug: 4293298

entry.title: The translation of “Inactive shortcuts” in Chinese is inappropriate
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. In Chinese(Simplified) UI, open “Settings”. 2. Select “Search Engine”, then select “Manage search engines and site search”.
# Problem Description The translation of “Inactive shortcuts” is inappropriate. It should not be “无效的快捷字词”. In contrast, it should be “未使用的快捷字词”, “不生效的快捷字词”, “未激活的快捷字词” or “非活动的快捷字词”.
# Summary The translation of “Inactive shortcuts” in Chinese is inappropriate
# Additional Data Category: UI \ Chrome Channel: Not sure \ Regression: No

entry.title: [Issue Tracker Feedback]how to retrive Monorail number from issue tracker number.
entry.content:
for example,https://crbug.com/1463935 was auto redirect to https://issues.chromium.org/issues/40067208. this fix CVE 2024-0814. but now I only can retrive issue tracker number from https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024/02/stable-channel-update-for-desktop.html. like：[$5000][41494539] High CVE-2024-1284: Use after free in Mojo. Reported by Anonymous on 2024-01-25 but now https://issues.chromium.org/issues/41494539 was not opened to me. as before, I can retrive in https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/ by search "bug:1463935", and I can find the fix of CVE 2024-0814 when https://crbug.com/1463935 was not open to me. but now,I can't find High CVE-2024-1284's fix by search "bug:41494539".I think the fix of CVE-2024-1284 was used Monorail number,so to search the fix of CVE-2024-1284,I should use "bug::CVE-2024-1284's Monorail number".
So, how can I find Monorail number by issue tracker number? Thank you.

entry.title: Using too much RAM crashes Chrome for Android.
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Open https://jsfiddle.net/98tr67qb/ (on Pixel 6a in my case) 2. The website crashes
# Problem Description I am trying to write a webapp which checks the available RAM. There is a "new Uint8Array(...)" inside a try/catch block.
It runs well on all OS / devices except of my Google Pixel 6a Android phone with the latest Android 14. I don't know if it happens on all Android phones.
# Summary Using too much RAM crashes Chrome for Android.
# Additional Data Category: JavaScript \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: Can't receive OTP codes through email, phone call or text message
entry.content:
Chrome Version: (copy from chrome://version) Lacros Version (if applicable): (copy from chrome://version) OS: (e.g. Win10, MacOS 10.12, etc...)
What steps will reproduce the problem? (1) open applications (2) forgotten password (3) send OTP codes
What is the expected result? OTP codes to be sent to my phone
What happens instead? No OTP codes sent to email, sms or phone call for any
Please use hotlists and text to provide additional information.
If this is a regression (i.e., worked before), please consider using the bisect tool (https://www.chromium.org/developers/bisect-builds-py) to help us identify the root cause and more rapidly triage the issue.
For graphics-related bugs, please copy/paste the contents of the about://gpu page at the end of this report.

entry.title: View transition and crashed frames
entry.content: Don't try to snapshot when navigating away from a crashed frame. Also listen to crash notifications so if the renderer crashes in the middle of snapshotting, we don't keep blocking the navigation.

entry.title: Shared zstd vs ZSDCH in Edge
entry.content:
https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/4664191 added the shared zstd feature, which adds "zstd-d" to the Accept-Encoding header of the Request.
Edge has a very similar functionality however they call the token in the header zsdch see: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/learnmore-zsdch-compression
The feature itself is pretty similar, the server signals a shared compression dictionary to the client via an header and the client uses this shared dictionary to de-compressed the payload of the response. This dictionary can be re-used over mutliple requests, thereby reducing total transfer volume..
I did not study both implementations in detail, but on the surface they look quite similar / archive the same goal.. To avoid fragmentation wouldn´t it be a good idea to agree on a common token name in the header?

Application version:
Steps to reproduce:
1. 2. 3.

Actual result:

---
It's especially helpful if you can capture a bug report right after you experience the bug, and attach it here. See https://developer.android.com/studio/debug/bug-report for instructions.
Screen recordings can also be very helpful - see https://developer.android.com/studio/command-line/adb#screenrecord. Please enable "Show taps" in developer settings.

entry.title: chrome://settings/passkeys doesn't show chrome-extensions' created passkeys
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. create a passkey from a chrome extension 2. go to chrome://settings/passkeys to look for the passkey expected - you will see the extension's created passkey actual - you only see webapp created passkeys
# Problem Description as a developer/user, I should be able to see all profile/local created passkeys from chrome://settings/passkeys, but chrome-extension created passkeys won't show up in there. Only webapp create passkeys are listed there.
# Summary chrome://settings/passkeys doesn't show chrome-extensions' created passkeys
# Additional Data Category: Developer Tools \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: PaintCanvasVideoRenderer::CopyVideoFrameToSharedImage should be static
entry.content: There's no need for it to be an instance method.

entry.title: [Feature Request] Set file name automatically after dragging and dropping files in DevTools Snippets
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Drag and drop a file in Snippets editor 2. 3.
# Problem Description The file name is not automatically set in the panel.
For example plnkr https://plnkr.co has the capability described. When a file is dragged and dropped to the Project left panel the file name is automatically set.
Additionally we should also be able to
- Load local files as DevTools Snippets using switches on the command-line - Open file picker to select files to add to Snippets, automatically setting the file name in left panel
# Summary [Feature Request] Set file name automatically after dragging and dropping files in DevTools Snippets
# Additional Data Category: Developer Tools \ Chrome Channel: Dev \ Regression: No

entry.title: [Extensions] Let user change shortcut for the Omnibox API
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Install extension which uses Omnibox 2. Open chrome://settings/searchEngines and find the entry for the installed extension 3. Observe that there is no way to change the Omnibox keyword
# Problem Description This is a mirror bug for https://github.com/w3c/webextensions/issues/545
The request is to add a way for user to explicitly edit the extension omnibox keyword.
# Summary [Extensions] Let user change shortcut for the Omnibox API
# Custom Questions #### Which component does this fall under? Not sure - I don't know
#### Does this feature work correctly in other browsers? No - I can reproduce the problem in another browser
#### Details of interop issue Other browsers do not allow user to change the keyword.
# Additional Data Category: API \ Chrome Channel: Not sure \ Regression: N/A
